summary: The ecosystem section explores the concept of ecosystems, both biological and modern, emphasizing their spatial and temporal nature. It discusses new practices in ecosystem architecture, underlining the importance of decentralization and regenerative design. The section highlights the parallels between natural and conceptual ecosystems, promoting innovative approaches to design and innovation.
excerpt: The article explores the biological and modern contextual meanings of ecosystems, proposing new practices in ecosystem architecture, emphasizing decentralization and regenerative design.
